title: Morning on the Cape
provenance_text:
Leon Kroll [1884-1974], until December 1935 [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1936 . 

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 72 in the "1935 International Exhibition of Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1935. It was purchased by the museum from the International on December 4, 1935 and was accessioned the following month.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
